reviewText:
An excellent film, and the scene where Lauren Bacall has a heart attack, early on , is not to be missed. Can she act!!!

Be aware of  bad Vault Collectible transfers. The Fox Movie channel of old had a CinemaScope copy..why didn't Fox use this for this very dramatic film, once it gets going.
Good quality. Nice plot for that era.
This is the second time that their have fooled me, the last time was with "On The Threshold Of Space". So all I can say is--Buyer Be Ware.

Buyer beware - This is a PAN AND SCAN transfer, and a very bad one at that. Fox apparently dug through its vaults to find the poorest dupe
print. The print that is shown on the Fox Movie Channel is a scope transfer with very nice color. This DVD, however, is shameful and a dastardly rip-off!!! UNWATCHABLE. Just saw the movie on TCM - it was Letterboxed!!!!!!!!!
